text:
Hi everyone.
Probably a pretty basic question: I would like to inject custom HTML to a HubSpot landingpage (not to website, only landingpage). What would be the best way to do that?
All support articles I found refer to either “website” or are outdated. Thanks for your help!

Hi, you can make a custom module and insert to your landing
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files>
Does anyone have a workaround for Looping Associated Companies in a custom quote?

Hi everyone,
We are using Auth0 for our dashboard. We want to login into the dashboard in the iFrame action of the CRM Card. Anyone has any idea regarding the same?

Hi <@U055FHZE3EY> Thanks! I tried that, unfortunately it appears that I can’t use custom modules in a starter template and if I want to create a landinpage without a starter template I would need to upgrade to upgrade to CMS Hub Professional
:wave:  I am looking for more inputs from all the developers/admins who have built or interacted with custom (CRM) cards.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report.a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Hey Larissa,

You should have access to the Rich Text Module. When editing the Rich Text Module, click under the Advanced option in the editing toolbar of the rich text, and there _should_ be a "Source Code" option which will show the rich text in its straight HTML form. Doing this, you can emulate an html box.

Additionally, you have the option to place HTML in the Head and Footer of your page in the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/add-code-to-the-head-or-footer-html-of-HubSpot-content|Advanced Settings>
I think this was a gross misunderstanding on my part.  I thought 'content' included contacts, companies & pipelines.  Thanks for the guidance.

Hey folks. I hope everyone is okay.

Could someone help me with a question? I received an email regarding a new requirement for redirect urls and I don't currently have any applications developed.

But HubSpot listed two links that lead me nowhere despite having created a developer account.

can anybody help me?

Hi, I'm developer in a partner company of HubSpot, I try to create associations between contacts, is someone already did this ?
It's for the use case : customer sponsorship.
Thanks
There's currently an alpha going on for this but it's not available for public use yet
if you don't have an application that's getting actively installed you can ignore this email.

Thanks for response ,
Is there an approx release date ? A range ?
Honestly I really don't know it's been in discussion for years now and the team is really just looking for a lot of feedback on it
So maybe I could think about a temporary custom solution for that ?

Hello, I need to add line_items image in marketing emails.
I already add line_items Name, Qty, Amount But for image it not shows.
So please guide me How can i show it in emails?
